CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 20, 1958, pg. 23 reads: "Yule Dinner Party - Ellis Hotel Dining Room was the scene of the recent Christmas dinner party, sponsored by Missionary Group One of Wesley Center AME Zion Church. The surprised honoree was H. Raymond Rice, seated center, back of table, who is the husband of their district president and Episcopal supervisor, Mrs. Willa Mae Rice, seated back of table, third from left.  Group members reflect satisfaction with the dinner and gifts received in secret pal exchange.  The president, Mrs. Lucinda Harper, seated back of table, second from left, planned the gala occasion and gave a small token to each member. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of men, including H. Raymond Rice, seated at center, and women, including Lucinda Harper, seated second from left, and Willa Mae Rice, seated third from left, posed around banquet table for Christmas party sponsored by Missionary Group One, in Ellis Hotel Dining Room
